game.name: Elsa Prom Dress Up
game.description:
The biggest grand ball is going to take place in this evening and the beautiful Elsa has already got the invitation from there. Her wardrobe is full of trendy and fashionable outfits. But, she is unable to decide what to put on to make her look gorgeous on this special occasion. In short, the princess needs your fashion advice. Would you like to help her out? Join Elsa Prom Dress Up game and be prepared to assist her pick up the most beautiful dress for the prom!

It is up to you how to encourage the princess to use her magic powers to create an awesome combination of outfit in this brand new dressing game for girls! Try to mix and match as many items as you can to make her look superb at the prom tonight! Start with a right kind of hairstyle, and then adorn her head with a suitable crown. Give her a lovely top and a matching short or long skirt or you can prepare her with an elegant piece of gown! 

Try to complete her look with an excellent handbag or a suitable magic stick in this html5 dress up game! Do not forget to provide her with a fashionable pair of shoes. Once you are done, click the show button and the final result will be displayed on the screen immediately. Remember today is the happiest day for the princess, so make sure to create an eye-catching look. Enjoy this cool makeover games for kids online, no download required!
